text: UPDATE–As of 4PM today, 1,816 Maine employers will receive $510,891,620 in Paycheck Protection Plan loans.  These forgivable loans will help keep paychecks coming for tens of thousands of Mainers who work at small businesses. Together, we will weather the storm caused by COVID-19
